mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linker.project(title, u_id, t_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{u_id}, #{t_id});
mapper.select: SELECT p.id , p.title , p.u_id , p.cdate , p.t_id , p.ps_id , p.u_id , u.email AS writerEmail , u.nickname AS writerNickname , uhp.status AS favorite FROM linker.user as u LEFT JOIN linker.team_has_user AS thu ON thu.u_id = u.id LEFT JOIN linker.project AS p ON thu.t_id = p.t_id LEFT JOIN linker.user_has_project AS uhp ON uhp.p_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{u_id} AND p.ps_id = 1 ORDER BY p.cdate DESC
SELECT title , ps_id FROM linker.project WHERE id = #{p_id}
SELECT * FROM linker.user JOIN linker.team_has_user ON user.id = team_has_user.u_id WHERE team_has_user.t_id = #{t_id};
SELECT count(*) FROM linker.user JOIN linker.team_has_user ON user.id = team_has_user.u_id WHERE team_has_user.u_id = #{u_id} AND team_has_user.t_id =#{t_id};

SELECT user.id AS u_id ,project.title ,project.ps_id ,project.t_id ,project.id FROM linker.user JOIN linker.team_has_user ON user.id = team_has_user.u_id JOIN linker.project ON team_has_user.t_id = project.t_id WHERE user.id =#{u_id} AND project.ps_id =2;

SELECT title,project.u_id,project.id,t_id FROM linker.user JOIN linker.user_has_project ON user_has_project.u_id = user.id JOIN linker.project ON project.id = user_has_project.p_id WHERE user.id=#{u_id} AND project.ps_id = 1 ORDER BY user_has_project.cdate DESC;
